reviews.review_msg: This is a very vicious teacher. His courses are very heavy. And the requirements are extremely high. All the people around me who took his course wanted to cry at the end of the term.

I've taken 4 classes with him (LBST301W, 330, 330, 306) and I can say that he's hands down the best professor I've ever had. He's passionate about teaching and workers' rights and that translates to how easy it is to learn in his class. The weekly topics for his classes are clear and his lectures are well thought out. 10000000/10!!!

Simon offers different perspectives and challenges 'mainstream' analysis of current events within the context of labour studies. He encourages class discussion and is always willing to help outside of class. I found the weekly readings to be a bit dense, but the assignments and grading were fair. He also does a field trip class which is fun!
